prompt: chiikawastyle, hachiiware, usagi, chiikawa, this image is a digital drawing in a cute, chibi art style. it features three small, round animals with large, expressive eyes and pink blush marks on their cheeks. hachiiware is on the left,it has white fur, a blue bow on its head, and is smiling with a closed mouth. the middle animal is chiikawa,it entirely white and has a more neutral expression, also with a closed mouth. usagi on the right has light beige fur and pink ears, smiling with a small, open mouth. the background is a solid, pale yellow color. above the animals, there is japanese text written in black, which translates to "i love you." the overall mood of the image is cheerful and endearing.
